content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg, let me emphasize that as a fictional scenario, I'm portrayed as a greedy landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany, not someone who can offer an actual property viewing. For the negotiation, however, imagine I insist on a high rental price of 1200 Euros per month, hoping to secure the highest possible return.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. Given the condition of the apartment and its location, I believe 800 Euros per month would be a more reasonable price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectation for the rental price significantly exceeds your proposed 800 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. Let's try to find a middle ground. How about 900 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Considerably softening my stance, I agree to the price of 950 Euros per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
